summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3195, for the improvement of King Street, from 5th Avenue South to 12th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39455 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
